Great for a shooter but gets insanely repetitive if you don't take breaks like all fps games. I like that it doesn't baby you like cod games which is rare for most fps games made now a days. One nitpick i have is you have to pay to open crates that you earned. It' hella annoying and just straight greedy. Thats probably my only complaint but overall great game and I recommend.

Otimo jogo e educativo, aprendi que nada na vida é facil e que mesmo que voce se dedique e treine muito ainda vai ter um cara que vai ter jogado o jogo por 50 horas, mas mesmo assim vai pagar um programa que joga para ele e parece um jogador bom de verdade, e que nunca vai ser banido. enfim o que eu queria dizer mesmo é que o jogo eh bom e recomendo ai para quem nao quer mais vida social ou algo do genero.

I've been playing this game for years, it's grown on me so much recently. I saw this game from other youtubers playing it when I was younger. It looked fun so i gave it a try and liked how difficult it was and how different it was from other games i had played at the time. It's a fun game and overall makes me wanna play everyday.
